section.heading: Directory of vehicle identification tags.

para.text: Within 90 days after the applicability date of this section, the Mayor shall establish, and thereafter maintain, a directory of all vehicle identification tags issued by U.S. states and territories.

section.codify:annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 25-325: § 401 of D.C. Law 25-325 provided that the creation of this section by § 114 of D.C. Law 25-325 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 25-325: § 401 of D.C. Law 25-325 provided that the creation of this section by § 114 of D.C. Law 25-325 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 6072(b) of D.C. Act 26-146 repealed the applicability provision of section 114(a) of D.C. Law 25-325 that impacted this section. Therefore the amendment to this section by §114(a) of Law 25-325 has been implemented.

Section 6072(b) of D.C. Act 26-210 repealed the applicability provision of section 114(a) of D.C. Law 25-325 that impacted this section. Therefore the amendment to this section by §114(a) of Law 25-325 has been implemented.
